document.full_text: forces loyal to libyan leader muammar gaddafi are mounting an intense artillery bombardment of rebel-held misrata and pro-gaddafi troops are attacking shops and homes in the city center, a rebel spokesman said.
document.title: libya's misrata under intense bombardment: rebels
lines_and_colors: forces loyal to libyan leader muammar gaddafi are mounting an intense artillery bombardment of rebel-held misrata and pro-gaddafi troops are attacking shops and homes in the city center, a rebel spokesman said.
